title: Update contribution guide with the ping method
body_html:
As discussed on Slack, I added "the ping method" to the contribution guide and removed the needs-review label as it seems to be obsolete now that Github has the PR review request feature. I'd of course once this is agreed upon also remove the label from the repo ✌️
(there only one old issue with this label at the moment)

body:
As discussed on Slack, I added "the ping method" to the contribution guide and removed the `needs-review` label as it seems to be obsolete now that Github has the PR review request feature. I'd of course once this is agreed upon also remove the label from the repo ✌️ 
_(there only one old issue with this label at the moment)_
